Fire Psychic "Bolt" Spray of Psychic Fire which can be dodged as with a ranged Spray Attack using a +0 Agility Test. Deals 1d10 + Psy Rating + Willpower Bonus energy Damage with PEN 0, Flame, Sanctified, and Spray Qualities.
